title: WebView - allow retrieval of cookies
body:
There should be the ability to retrieve cookies. This can be done already using something like:
`string cookies = webView.InvokeScriptAsync("eval", "document.cookie");`
but this technique will not work for cookies marked as 'HTML only' - which would be the case with most secure cookies.

comments.body: The purpose of this requirement is to allow app login scenarios - showing a login dialog in a browser and then making HTTP requests with the returned cookie.
